channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Protests over Tanzania’s election results continue for third day
item.description: Demonstrations over Tanzania’s disputed election results entered a third day Friday, with hundreds of protesters clashing with police in the commercial capital, Dar es Salaam, prompting the deployment of the military and an internet shutdown. The unrest began Wednesday after the Chama Cha Ma

item.title: Saudi Arabia shortens Umrah visa validity to 30 days before entry
item.description: Saudi Arabia has revised its Umrah visa regulations, which will see visas being automatically cancelled 30 days after issuance if the pilgrim does not enter the Gulf kingdom within that time. The new policy is expected to take effect next week, Saudi state-owned broadcaster Al Arabiya reported on

item.title: Trump-Putin summit cancelled after Moscow sent memo to Washington
item.description: The United States cancelled a planned Budapest summit between President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin following Russia's firm stance on hardline demands regarding Ukraine, reports Reuters, citing the Financial Times on Friday. The decision came after a tense call between the

item.title: US signs 10-year defence pact with India, Hegseth says
item.description: The United States has signed a 10-year defence framework agreement with India, US Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said on Friday.
